bit_field.name: MAXMB
bit_field.description: Number Of The Last Message Buffer

bit_field_value.name: MCR_IDAM_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Format A: One full ID (standard and extended) per ID Filter Table element.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_IDAM_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Format B: Two full standard IDs or two partial 14-bit (standard and extended) IDs per ID Filter Table element.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_IDAM_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Format C: Four partial 8-bit Standard IDs per ID Filter Table element.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_IDAM_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Format D: All frames rejected.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_AEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Abort disabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_AEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Abort enabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_LPRIOEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Local Priority disabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_LPRIOEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Local Priority enabled.

bit_field.name: IRMQ
bit_field.description: Individual Rx Masking And Queue Enable

bit_field_value.name: MCR_IRMQ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Individual Rx masking and queue feature are disabled. For backward compatibility with legacy applications, the reading of C/S word locks the MB even if it is EMPTY.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_IRMQ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Individual Rx masking and queue feature are enabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_SRXDIS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Self reception enabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_SRXDIS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Self reception disabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_WAKSRC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN uses the unfiltered Rx input to detect recessive to dominant edges on the CAN bus.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_WAKSRC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN uses the filtered Rx input to detect recessive to dominant edges on the CAN bus.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_LPMACK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is not in a low-power mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_LPMACK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is in a low-power mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_WRNEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: TWRNINT and RWRNINT bits are zero, independent of the values in the error counters.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_WRNEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: TWRNINT and RWRNINT bits are set when the respective error counter transitions from less than 96 to greater than or equal to 96.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_SLFWAK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN Self Wake Up feature is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_SLFWAK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN Self Wake Up feature is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_SUPV_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is in User mode. Affected registers allow both Supervisor and Unrestricted accesses .

bit_field_value.name: MCR_SUPV_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is in Supervisor mode. Affected registers allow only Supervisor access. Unrestricted access behaves as though the access was done to an unimplemented register location .

bit_field_value.name: MCR_FRZACK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN not in Freeze mode, prescaler running.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_FRZACK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN in Freeze mode, prescaler stopped.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_SOFTRST_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No reset request.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_SOFTRST_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Resets the registers affected by soft reset.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_WAKMSK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Wake Up Interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_WAKMSK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Wake Up Interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_NOTRDY_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN module is either in Normal mode, Listen-Only mode or Loop-Back mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_NOTRDY_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN module is either in Disable mode , Stop mode or Freeze mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_HALT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No Freeze mode request.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_HALT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enters Freeze mode if the FRZ bit is asserted.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_RFEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Rx FIFO not enabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_RFEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Rx FIFO enabled.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_FRZ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Not enabled to enter Freeze mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_FRZ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enabled to enter Freeze mode.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_MDIS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Enable the FlexCAN module.

bit_field_value.name: MCR_MDIS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Disable the FlexCAN module.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_LOM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Listen-Only mode is deactivated.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_LOM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN module operates in Listen-Only mode.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_LBUF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Buffer with highest priority is transmitted first.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_LBUF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Lowest number buffer is transmitted first.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_TSYN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Timer Sync feature disabled

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_TSYN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Timer Sync feature enabled

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_BOFFREC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Automatic recovering from Bus Off state enabled, according to CAN Spec 2.0 part B.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_BOFFREC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Automatic recovering from Bus Off state disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_SMP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Just one sample is used to determine the bit value.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_SMP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Three samples are used to determine the value of the received bit: the regular one (sample point) and 2 preceding samples; a majority rule is used.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_RWRNMSK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Rx Warning Interrupt disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_RWRNMSK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Rx Warning Interrupt enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_TWRNMSK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Tx Warning Interrupt disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_TWRNMSK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Tx Warning Interrupt enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_LPB_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Loop Back disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_LPB_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Loop Back enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_CLKSRC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The CAN engine clock source is the oscillator clock. Under this condition, the oscillator clock frequency must be lower than the bus clock.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_CLKSRC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The CAN engine clock source is the peripheral clock.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_ERRMSK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Error interrupt disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_ERRMSK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Error interrupt enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_BOFFMSK_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Bus Off interrupt disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL1_BOFFMSK_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Bus Off interrupt enabled.

bit_field_value.name: RXMGMASK_MG_0b00000000000000000000000000000000
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care."

bit_field_value.name: RXMGMASK_MG_0b00000000000000000000000000000001
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked.

bit_field_value.name: RX14MASK_RX14M_0b00000000000000000000000000000000
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care."

bit_field_value.name: RX14MASK_RX14M_0b00000000000000000000000000000001
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked.

bit_field_value.name: RX15MASK_RX15M_0b00000000000000000000000000000000
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care."

bit_field_value.name: RX15MASK_RX15M_0b00000000000000000000000000000001
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_WAKINT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_WAKINT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Indicates a recessive to dominant transition was received on the CAN bus.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_ERRINT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_ERRINT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Indicates setting of any Error Bit in the Error and Status Register.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_BOFFINT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_BOFFINT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN module entered Bus Off state.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_RX_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is not receiving a message.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_RX_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is receiving a message.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_FLTCONF_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Error Active

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_FLTCONF_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Error Passive

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_FLTCONF_0b1x
bit_field_value.description: Bus Off

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_TX_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is not transmitting a message.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_TX_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is transmitting a message.

bit_field.name: IDLE
bit_field.description: This bit indicates when CAN bus is in IDLE state. See the table in the overall CAN_ESR1 register description.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_IDLE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_IDLE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: CAN bus is now IDLE.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_RXWRN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_RXWRN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: RXERRCNT is greater than or equal to 96.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_TXWRN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_TXWRN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: TXERRCNT is greater than or equal to 96.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_STFERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_STFERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A Stuffing Error occurred since last read of this register.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_FRMERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_FRMERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A Form Error occurred since last read of this register.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_CRCERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_CRCERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A CRC error occurred since last read of this register.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_ACKERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_ACKERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: An ACK error occurred since last read of this register.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_BIT0ERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_BIT0ERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: At least one bit sent as dominant is received as recessive.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_BIT1ERR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_BIT1ERR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: At least one bit sent as recessive is received as dominant.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_RWRNINT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_RWRNINT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The Rx error counter transitioned from less than 96 to greater than or equal to 96.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_TWRNINT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No such occurrence.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_TWRNINT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The Tx error counter transitioned from less than 96 to greater than or equal to 96.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_SYNCH_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is not synchronized to the CAN bus.

bit_field_value.name: ESR1_SYNCH_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexCAN is synchronized to the CAN bus.

bit_field_value.name: IMASK1_BUFLM_0b00000000000000000000000000000000
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding buffer Interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: IMASK1_BUFLM_0b00000000000000000000000000000001
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding buffer Interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF0I_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding buffer has no occurrence of successfully completed transmission or reception when MCR[RFEN]=0.

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF0I_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding buffer has successfully completed transmission or reception when MCR[RFEN]=0.

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF4TO1I_0b0000
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding buffer has no occurrence of successfully completed transmission or reception when MCR[RFEN]=0.

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF4TO1I_0b0001
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding buffer has successfully completed transmission or reception when MCR[RFEN]=0.

bit_field.name: BUF5I
bit_field.description: Buffer MB5 Interrupt Or "Frames available in Rx FIFO"

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF5I_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No occurrence of MB5 completing transmission/reception when MCR[RFEN]=0, or of frame(s) available in the FIFO, when MCR[RFEN]=1

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF5I_0b1
bit_field_value.description: MB5 completed transmission/reception when MCR[RFEN]=0, or frame(s) available in the Rx FIFO when MCR[RFEN]=1

bit_field.name: BUF6I
bit_field.description: Buffer MB6 Interrupt Or "Rx FIFO Warning"

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF6I_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No occurrence of MB6 completing transmission/reception when MCR[RFEN]=0, or of Rx FIFO almost full when MCR[RFEN]=1

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF6I_0b1
bit_field_value.description: MB6 completed transmission/reception when MCR[RFEN]=0, or Rx FIFO almost full when MCR[RFEN]=1

bit_field.name: BUF7I
bit_field.description: Buffer MB7 Interrupt Or "Rx FIFO Overflow"

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF7I_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No occurrence of MB7 completing transmission/reception when MCR[RFEN]=0, or of Rx FIFO overflow when MCR[RFEN]=1

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF7I_0b1
bit_field_value.description: MB7 completed transmission/reception when MCR[RFEN]=0, or Rx FIFO overflow when MCR[RFEN]=1

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF31TO8I_0b000000000000000000000000
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding buffer has no occurrence of successfully completed transmission or reception.

bit_field_value.name: IFLAG1_BUF31TO8I_0b000000000000000000000001
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding buffer has successfully completed transmission or reception.

bit_field.name: EACEN
bit_field.description: Entire Frame Arbitration Field Comparison Enable For Rx Mailboxes

bit_field_value.name: CTRL2_EACEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Rx Mailbox filter's IDE bit is always compared and RTR is never compared despite mask bits.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL2_EACEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enables the comparison of both Rx Mailbox filter's IDE and RTR bit with their corresponding bits within the incoming frame. Mask bits do apply.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL2_RRS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Remote Response Frame is generated.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL2_RRS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Remote Request Frame is stored.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL2_MRP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Matching starts from Rx FIFO and continues on Mailboxes.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL2_MRP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Matching starts from Mailboxes and continues on Rx FIFO.

bit_field.name: WRMFRZ
bit_field.description: Write-Access To Memory In Freeze Mode

bit_field_value.name: CTRL2_WRMFRZ_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Maintain the write access restrictions.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL2_WRMFRZ_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable unrestricted write access to FlexCAN memory.

bit_field_value.name: ESR2_IMB_0b0
bit_field_value.description: If ESR2[VPS] is asserted, the ESR2[LPTM] is not an inactive Mailbox.

bit_field_value.name: ESR2_IMB_0b1
bit_field_value.description: If ESR2[VPS] is asserted, there is at least one inactive Mailbox. LPTM content is the number of the first one.

bit_field_value.name: ESR2_VPS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Contents of IMB and LPTM are invalid.

bit_field_value.name: ESR2_VPS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Contents of IMB and LPTM are valid.

bit_field_value.name: RXFGMASK_FGM_0b00000000000000000000000000000000
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care."

bit_field_value.name: RXFGMASK_FGM_0b00000000000000000000000000000001
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked.

bit_field.name: TIME_STAMP
bit_field.description: Free-Running Counter Time stamp. This 16-bit field is a copy of the Free-Running Timer, captured for Tx and Rx frames at the time when the beginning of the Identifier field appears on the CAN bus.

bit_field.name: DLC
bit_field.description: Length of the data to be stored/transmitted.

bit_field.name: RTR
bit_field.description: Remote Transmission Request. One/zero for remote/data frame.

bit_field.name: IDE
bit_field.description: ID Extended. One/zero for extended/standard format frame.

bit_field.name: SRR
bit_field.description: Substitute Remote Request. Contains a fixed recessive bit.

bit_field.name: EXT
bit_field.description: Contains extended (LOW word) identifier of message buffer.

bit_field.name: STD
bit_field.description: Contains standard/extended (HIGH word) identifier of message buffer.

bit_field.name: PRIO
bit_field.description: Local priority. This 3-bit fieldis only used when LPRIO_EN bit is set in MCR and it only makes sense for Tx buffers. These bits are not transmitted. They are appended to the regular ID to define the transmission priority.

bit_field.name: TIME_STAMP
bit_field.description: Free-Running Counter Time stamp. This 16-bit field is a copy of the Free-Running Timer, captured for Tx and Rx frames at the time when the beginning of the Identifier field appears on the CAN bus.

bit_field.name: DLC
bit_field.description: Length of the data to be stored/transmitted.

bit_field.name: RTR
bit_field.description: Remote Transmission Request. One/zero for remote/data frame.

bit_field.name: IDE
bit_field.description: ID Extended. One/zero for extended/standard format frame.

bit_field.name: SRR
bit_field.description: Substitute Remote Request. Contains a fixed recessive bit.

bit_field.name: EXT
bit_field.description: Contains extended (LOW word) identifier of message buffer.

bit_field.name: STD
bit_field.description: Contains standard/extended (HIGH word) identifier of message buffer.

bit_field.name: PRIO
bit_field.description: Local priority. This 3-bit fieldis only used when LPRIO_EN bit is set in MCR and it only makes sense for Tx buffers. These bits are not transmitted. They are appended to the regular ID to define the transmission priority.

bit_field.name: TIME_STAMP
bit_field.description: Free-Running Counter Time stamp. This 16-bit field is a copy of the Free-Running Timer, captured for Tx and Rx frames at the time when the beginning of the Identifier field appears on the CAN bus.

bit_field.name: DLC
bit_field.description: Length of the data to be stored/transmitted.

bit_field.name: RTR
bit_field.description: Remote Transmission Request. One/zero for remote/data frame.

bit_field.name: IDE
bit_field.description: ID Extended. One/zero for extended/standard format frame.

bit_field.name: SRR

bit_field.description: Local priority. This 3-bit fieldis only used when LPRIO_EN bit is set in MCR and it only makes sense for Tx buffers. These bits are not transmitted. They are appended to the regular ID to define the transmission priority.

bit_field.name: TIME_STAMP
bit_field.description: Free-Running Counter Time stamp. This 16-bit field is a copy of the Free-Running Timer, captured for Tx and Rx frames at the time when the beginning of the Identifier field appears on the CAN bus.

bit_field.name: DLC
bit_field.description: Length of the data to be stored/transmitted.

bit_field.name: RTR
bit_field.description: Remote Transmission Request. One/zero for remote/data frame.

bit_field.name: IDE
bit_field.description: ID Extended. One/zero for extended/standard format frame.

bit_field.name: SRR
bit_field.description: Substitute Remote Request. Contains a fixed recessive bit.

bit_field.name: EXT
bit_field.description: Contains extended (LOW word) identifier of message buffer.

bit_field.name: STD
bit_field.description: Contains standard/extended (HIGH word) identifier of message buffer.

bit_field.name: PRIO
bit_field.description: Local priority. This 3-bit fieldis only used when LPRIO_EN bit is set in MCR and it only makes sense for Tx buffers. These bits are not transmitted. They are appended to the regular ID to define the transmission priority.

bit_field.name: TIME_STAMP
bit_field.description: Free-Running Counter Time stamp. This 16-bit field is a copy of the Free-Running Timer, captured for Tx and Rx frames at the time when the beginning of the Identifier field appears on the CAN bus.

bit_field.name: DLC
bit_field.description: Length of the data to be stored/transmitted.

bit_field.name: RTR
bit_field.description: Remote Transmission Request. One/zero for remote/data frame.

bit_field.name: IDE
bit_field.description: ID Extended. One/zero for extended/standard format frame.

bit_field.name: SRR
bit_field.description: Substitute Remote Request. Contains a fixed recessive bit.

bit_field.name: EXT
bit_field.description: Contains extended (LOW word) identifier of message buffer.

bit_field_value.name: RXIMR_MI_0b00000000000000000000000000000000
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care."

bit_field_value.name: RXIMR_MI_0b00000000000000000000000000000001
bit_field_value.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked.
